headline: Realty Income Expands Into Mexican Industrials And Builds New Fee Streams
summary: Realty Income (NYSE:O) is entering the Mexican industrial property market, expanding beyond its traditional net lease retail focus. The company is also launching a new asset management business aimed at institutional investors, targeting fee-based income streams. Together, these moves mark a broader push into international markets and third party capital management. Realty Income is widely known for its net lease retail portfolio and monthly dividend payments. Its move into Mexican...
